name: SPACE SNAKE, dun dun dunnnn
description:
Hey guys, i had a blast making this in a few hours. As i type this my dogs doing some really strange thing where he's rolling kind of on his back. Not sure if that is useful information or not, but hey its six am and i've yet to go to bed! But in all seriousness, this was a great time. I hope you guys enjoy my silly little extremely basic loading screen mini game. I had a blast making it!

IF you're on mac, download the file and unzip the mac version, and same for linux.
